cantaloupe.frameworks.hookspec module¶

class cantaloupe.frameworks.hookspec.CantaloupeSpec[source]¶

Bases: object

cantaloupe_build_config_files(context: Context) → list['Config'][source]¶

This hook is called to build config files for the current run. :param context: The build context of the current run :type context: Context :return: None :rtype: None

cantaloupe_build_spec(context: Context, workflow: Workflow, steps: list['str']) → Spec[source]¶

This hook is called to build the spec for a workflow.

Parameters:

  • context (Context) – The build context of the current run

  • workflow (Workflow) – The workflow to build

  • steps (list[str]) – A list of steps to build

Returns:

The generated spec

Return type:

Spec

cantaloupe_render_step(step: Step) → str[source]¶

This hook is called to render a step.

A step represents a single action in a workflow and directly corresponds to a one or more lines of code in the generated spec.

Parameters:

step (Step) – The step to render

Returns:

The rendered step as a string

Return type:

str

cantaloupe_setup(context: Context) → None[source]¶
cantaloupe_teardown(context: Context) → None[source]¶

This hook is called after all workflows have been built.

Parameters:

context (Context) – The build context of the current run

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

cantaloupe_workflow_build_begin(workflow: Workflow) → Workflow[source]¶

This hook is called before a workflow is built.

workflow –

Returns:

The workflow to build

Return type:

Workflow

cantaloupe_workflow_build_complete(result: BuildResult) → BuildResult[source]¶

This hook is called after a workflow has been built.

Parameters:

result (BuildResult) – The result of the build

Returns:

The generated spec
